issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

status.description: A patch for this issue has been uploaded to JIRA by a contributor.
status.name: Patch Available

fields.description:
Bunch of issues discovered in CachedStore to keep up column statistics:
1.Â The criteria for partition/non-partition is wrong (table.isSetPartitionKeys() is always true)
2. In update(), partition column stats are removed when populate table basic stats
3. Dirty flags are true right after prewarm(), so the first update() does not do anything
4. Could invoke cacheLock without holding the lock, which results a freeze in update()
fields.summary: CachedStore fail to cache stats in multiple code paths

comments.body: Initial patch. Will follow up with tests.
